rooms.name: Living Area & Open Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: A spacious area combining the living room and modern kitchen with an island counter, designed to allow natural light entry through large windows. Vastu compliant placement with entrance facing east for auspicious energy.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area, this room is designed for family meals and gatherings. It includes a dining table with seating for eight and is aligned with Vastu principles by maintaining an east-west orientation.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace equipped with soundproofing, ample natural lighting from north-facing windows, ergonomic furniture, and technology integration. The office is located on the ground floor for ease of access.

openings.description: Main entrance with a vestibule to control noise and maintain privacy.
Separate access door leading directly to the private gym located on the ground floor.
Spacious balcony attached to the living area and home office for relaxation and natural light.
